overview: Woody’s wide range of senior-level experience as an investor and in portfolio company management allows him to bring a unique perspective to his role as a Special Limited Partner with Novus. With a broad background in service and manufacturing industries, he recently has provided strategic planning counsel to Silicon Valley CEOs. He has served as a consultant to Wells Fargo Investment Corporation, was founder and CEO of venture-backed Wallbangers Court Centers, and was CEO of Patterson-Williams, a national playground, parks and athletic-field products manufacturer.
